sad wal-qur'āni dhī al-dhik'ri
bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
waʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum waqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā sāḥirun kadhābun
ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
wa-inṭalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shū wa-iṣ'birū ʿalā ālihatikum inna hādhā lashayon yurādu
mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
a-unzila ʿalayhi al-dhik'ru min bayninā bal hum fī shakkin min dhik'rī bal lammā yadhūqū ʿadhābi
am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
am lahum mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā falyartaqū fī al-asbābi
jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
wamā yanẓuru hāulāi illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan mā lahā min fawāqin
waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
wal-ṭayra maḥshūratan kullun lahu awwābun
washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
idh dakhalū ʿalā dāwūda fafaziʿa min'hum qālū lā takhaf khaṣmāni baghā baʿḍunā ʿalā baʿḍin fa-uḥ'kum baynanā bil-ḥaqi walā tush'ṭiṭ wa-ih'dinā ilā sawāi al-ṣirāṭi
inna hādhā akhī lahu tis'ʿun watis'ʿūna naʿjatan waliya naʿjatun wāḥidatun faqāla akfil'nīhā waʿazzanī fī al-khiṭābi

qāla laqad ẓalamaka bisuāli naʿjatika ilā niʿājihi wa-inna kathīran mina al-khulaṭāi layabghī baʿḍuhum ʿalā baʿḍin illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti waqalīlun mā hum waẓanna dāwūdu annamā fatannāhu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra rākiʿan wa-anāba
faghafarnā lahu dhālika wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin

yādāwūdu innā jaʿalnāka khalīfatan fī al-arḍi fa-uḥ'kum bayna al-nāsi bil-ḥaqi walā tattabiʿi al-hawā fayuḍillaka ʿan sabīli al-lahi inna alladhīna yaḍillūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun bimā nasū yawma al-ḥisābi
wamā khalaqnā al-samāa wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā bāṭilan dhālika ẓannu alladhīna kafarū fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū mina al-nāri
am najʿalu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kal-muf'sidīna fī al-arḍi am najʿalu al-mutaqīna kal-fujāri
kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka mubārakun liyaddabbarū āyātihi waliyatadhakkara ulū al-albābi
wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
faqāla innī aḥbabtu ḥubba al-khayri ʿan dhik'ri rabbī ḥattā tawārat bil-ḥijābi
ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
walaqad fatannā sulaymāna wa-alqaynā ʿalā kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anāba
qāla rabbi igh'fir lī wahab lī mul'kan lā yanbaghī li-aḥadin min baʿdī innaka anta al-wahābu
fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
wal-shayāṭīna kulla bannāin waghawwāṣin
waākharīna muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
wawahabnā lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum maʿahum raḥmatan minnā wadhik'rā li-ulī al-albābi
wakhudh biyadika ḍigh'than fa-iḍ'rib bihi walā taḥnath innā wajadnāhu ṣābiran niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
wa-udh'kur ʿibādanā ib'rāhīma wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba ulī al-aydī wal-abṣāri
innā akhlaṣnāhum bikhāliṣatin dhik'rā al-dāri
wa-innahum ʿindanā lamina al-muṣ'ṭafayna al-akhyāri
wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
jannāti ʿadnin mufattaḥatan lahumu al-abwābu
muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
waʿindahum qāṣirātu al-ṭarfi atrābun
hādhā mā tūʿadūna liyawmi al-ḥisābi
inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
hādhā wa-inna lilṭṭāghīna lasharra maābin
jahannama yaṣlawnahā fabi'sa al-mihādu
hādhā falyadhūqūhu ḥamīmun waghassāqun
waākharu min shaklihi azwājun
hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
qālū bal antum lā marḥaban bikum antum qaddamtumūhu lanā fabi'sa al-qarāru
qālū rabbanā man qaddama lanā hādhā fazid'hu ʿadhāban ḍiʿ'fan fī al-nāri
waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
qul huwa naba-on ʿaẓīmun
antum ʿanhu muʿ'riḍūna
mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
fasajada al-malāikatu kulluhum ajmaʿūna
illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
qāla yāib'līsu mā manaʿaka an tasjuda limā khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-ʿālīna
qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
qāla fa-ukh'ruj min'hā fa-innaka rajīmun
wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
qāla fa-innaka mina al-munẓarīna
ilā yawmi al-waqti al-maʿlūmi
qāla fabiʿizzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿīna
illā ʿibādaka min'humu al-mukh'laṣīna
qāla fal-ḥaqu wal-ḥaqa aqūlu
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
